ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NS_Created_using_Quick_Case__c <> True, !ISBLANK(NS_Equipment_Init_and_Number__c ) ,NOT( REGEX( NS_Equipment_Init_and_Number__c , "^\\s*[A-Za-z]{1,4}\\s*(X|E|P|x|e|p)?(\\s|0)*[0-9]{6}\\s*$") ), OR( AND( ISPICKVAL(NS_InteractionCategory__c,"Intermodal"), !ISPICKVAL(NS_InteractionReason__c,"Billing"), PRIORVALUE(NS_RecordTypeName__c) = 'NS Intermodal Non Shipping' ), PRIORVALUE(NS_RecordTypeName__c) = 'NS Intermodal Shipping' ), NOT($User.CommunityNickname = 'automated.process'), NOT(ISCHANGED(NS_Last_Activity_Time__c)), NOT(ISCHANGED(NS_Counter_Activity__c)) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Equipment Init and Number is required. Please enter up to 4 characters of Equipment Initials, optional Equipment Type (X, E, P), and 6 digits of Equipment Numbers. (e.g. ABCD 123456, WXYZ P678912)
